title: Will I get any hostels in Brilliant Pala with an 89%? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was a student persuing entrance course in brilliant pala …but of long term batch….well but i will tell you what i know about repeaters batch (assuming you have scored 89% in cbse boards considering the time and marks you have put on the post) ..yes! U can get into the courses and avail the hostel facility with your marks…in fact any1 with average marks can grt into brilliant tutorials…but higher your marks greater the scholarship..and god! Theybprovide you wih great scholarship offer…even free courses are provided to tppers…so dont worry ..you will easily get into brilliant tutorials and avail its hostel faciliy …for more info. Visit http://www.brilliantpala.org.in - repeaters courses and learn more about the course favility and scholarship programme…all the best :)

Hello, I’m not sure if u have given your 12th aggregate or PCB/PCM marks. Assuming its not your aggregeate, I’d say you may get a brilliant hostel which is a bit distant from the campus. All hostels near the campuses would require a 90+ average in your 3 subjects (P,C, B/M). you can surely get any privately owned hostels near the campus easily beacuse you have 85+ % marks.but just let me say that the type of hostel will not influence you than your attitute towards a drop year. Cheers, and All The Best. :P
